text:
Sumo Logic | Backend Engineer | Warsaw, Poland | Onsite, Visa

We do grep and top on steroids in the cloud. Huge scale, exciting tech (AWS, Scala, distributed systems)...

https://www.sumologic.com

Web UI Engineer: https://boards.greenhouse.io/sumologic/jobs/1080682#.WsJazNN...

Backend Engineer: https://boards.greenhouse.io/sumologic/jobs/267415

Among other stuff, we would love to hire someone who would work on development excellence which will improve productivity of 100+ engineers (Continuous Deployment, Scala tooling, component based testing infrastructure).
